full_summary:
=================
**Tender Title**
-----------------
Responsive Maintenance Services for Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA)

**Reference Number**
-------------------
WS4234154597

**Publication Date**
-------------------
2023-11-01

**Closing Date**
----------------
2023-12-19 (2:00 pm EST)

**Notice URL**
----------------
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17888678?extsite=MTc4ODg2NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**
------------------------
Martin Gauthier
Minister of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice Description**
-------------------------
The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio, in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work.

**Trade Agreements**
----------------------
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**UNSPC Codes**
----------------
The following UNSPC codes apply to this procurement:

* 30180000 - Plumbing fixtures
* 72151200 - Heating and cooling and air conditioning HVAC construction and maintenance services
* 80161601 - Property management services

**Required Documents**
------------------------
Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by December 19, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST.

**Teleconference**
----------------
An optional teleconference will be held on November 14, 2023, at 1:00 pm EST (English) and November 15, 2023, at 1:00 pm EST
